title: Fonts aparecem amontoadas
content:
Olá, o meu Firefox desktop (rodando no macOS Big Sur 11.5.2) mostra as fonts de alguns sites de maneira amontoada, como na imagem em anexo. Mexi nas configurações e consegui resolver o problema uma vez, mas aí não conseguia ver alterações de fonte no fórum que frequento. Por exemplo, alguém mudava a fonte de Arial pra Courier, mas eu continuava enxergando Arial.

Já removi as extensões, mas o problema persistiu. Reinstalei o Firefox e a mesma coisa. Alguém sabe como resolver esse problema?

Obrigado.
creator: fred129

title: Yer imleri silindi geri yüklenmiyor
content: Merhaba. Mozilla firefox çöktükten sonra yer imleri silindi. Menü-Yer imleri-Yer imleri yönet'i seçiyorum Arşiv açılıyor. İçe aktarma ve yedekleme kısmından geri yükleye tıklıyorum. Yedek dosyası işlenemiyor uyarısı veriyor. Yer imleri nasıl geri gelecek? Lütfen yardımcı olur musunuz?
creator: ipekozturk90

title: Problem logging on to a bank between updates of Firefox versions (110.0 and 111.1.0)
content: I recently updated to Firefox 111.0.1 (64 bit) on windows 7 on a desktop and now I can't log into my online banking site. I can still get on from a laptop computer using Firefox 110.0 (64 bit) running windows 7. So either the bank changed something or Mozilla did. Another piece of information is that it appears to happen when the bank doesn't recognize my computer ( I delete my cookies and history on both computers when I exit my browser) and it provides me options to verify my identity. That screen never appears on the desktop and it takes me back to the login screen
creator: fcalhoun

title: Youtube laggy, slow to start
content: FireFox works well for everything I need except for youtube. There is usually a 5-10 second delay before a video starts playing. And once it is playing the video will often stutter (audio stays fine). Overall the site just runs really slow. I've tried using a private window and the problem is present there without any of my extensions active. Also I've tested on Chrome and youtube runs much smoother in that browser. Please help?
creator: henryowinston

title: Configuring AddOn Parameters using `policy.json`?
content:
I'm setting up addon installation through `policy.json`. Below is an example. I am wondering howto configure addons thus installed using the same file. Is it possible? If yes: where to find addon-specific keys/options? As an example: when providing below `policy.json`, starting any fresh firefox profile/installation produces the dialog "Startpage.com - Private Search Engine would like to change your default search engine from Google to Startpage.com - English. Is that OK?", followed by yes/no buttons. I would like to be able to just make the addon do so forgoing the dialog.

Thanks for any pointers.

{ 

 "policies": {    "ExtensionSettings": {      "*": {        "blocked_install_message": "Installation of extensions only allowed from 'policy.json'.",        "installation_mode": "blocked"      },      "{20fc2e06-e3e4-4b2b-812b-ab431220cada}": {        "installation_mode": "force_installed",        "install_url": "https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/downloads/latest/startpage-private-search/latest.xpi"      }    },    "ExtensionUpdate": true  }

}
creator: nonsense2

title: Kétlépcsős hitelesítés (2 factor authentication)
content:
Üdvözlöm A problémám a kétlépcsős hitelesítés beállításával van. Google Authenticator applikációval próbálom a fiókomat beállítani, de a QR-kód beolvasása után amit kiad kódot az alkalmazás, nem fogadja el a Firefox, így nem engedi beállítani a védelmet. Mit tudok ilyenkor tenni?

Welcome My problem is with setting up two-step authentication. I am trying to set up my account with the Google Authenticator application, but after scanning the QR code, the code that the application brings up is not accepted by Firefox, so it does not allow me to set up the protection. What can I do in this situation?

title: Inbox does not display
content:
When I refresh my inbox, the items appear and then immediately disappear. All of my folders are still visible and when I open a folder, I can see all of the items and they do not disappear. I am running MS Outlook on a Macbook Pro with macOS Ventura 13.3.

My inbox is visible on both my iPhone and iPad. It is only on the MacBook that the inbox disappears.

John

creator: jrwecker

title: Firefox não segue configuração de tecla com xmodmap no Linux
content: Precisei configurar as funções da tecla 105 no Linux com o comando: $ xmodmap -e 'keycode 105 = slash question degree' Todos os aplicativos seguem a configuração, menos o Firefox onde a tecla 105 continua com a função de Ctrl. Como eu configuro o Firefox para ele obedecer a configuração do xmodmap e não seguir a configuração original da tecla 105?
creator: FraterLinux
